amendment.description: Amendment increases funds for the FBI's Innocent Images Program by $3.3 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funds (by offset) for the FBI's Innocent Images Program by $3,300,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Johnson (CT) amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A008) offered by Mrs. Johnson (CT).
